item.title: Farming
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ye if you want help google it try to start it look of other sources. Just don’t expect us to give u a code that will do it all. this is HELP not Giveouts. Even though I have asked people to doo stuff for me I respect wht they mods say now as they are right. There are only a handful of good coders that can help. And some get annoyed when they get asked by people to do stuff for them[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 09:24:01 pm[/size][hr]Here I found some stuff for seeds use this and edit a little to use for farming

[code]public void guamSeed() // start of farming by i loot i
{
if (playerLevel[19] >= 1) {
addSkillXP((5 * playerLevel[19]), 19);
addItem(249, 1);
pEmote = 0x831;
deleteItem(5291, getItemSlot(5291), 1);
sendMessage(“You put the seed on the patch and get an herb”);
} else if (playerLevel[19] < 1) {
sendMessage(“You need atleast 1 farming to plant this!”);
}
}

public void marrentillSeed() {
    if (playerLevel[19] >= 15) {
        addSkillXP((10 * playerLevel[19]), 19);
        addItem(251, 1);
        pEmote = 0x831;
        deleteItem(5292, getItemSlot(5292), 1);
        sendMessage("You put the seed on the patch and get an herb");
    } else if (playerLevel[19] < 15) {
        sendMessage("You need atleast 15 farming to plant this!");
    }
}
